data.title: hotel where kurt cobain overdosed in 94 in roma : nirvana, kurt cobain, courtney love
data.meta_description: pop culture landmarks and locations from movies, music, television, literature, comic books, video games & more
data.text: The Exelcior Hotel in Via Veneto is where Kurt Cobain and Courtney Love stayed in February 1994 a few days after Nirvana's gig in Palaghiaccio di Marino (22 of February 1994). Courtney Love found Kurt sensless (he was in a coma) in his hotel room after he had attempted suicide by taking Roipnol and Champaigne. He was taken to the Umberto I hospital first then to a private clinic. Two months later he would commit suicide in his house in Seattle.
